ModMetaData.name: Extract & Analyze
ModMetaData.author: NickH
ModMetaData.description:
Extract colonist and colony data either for analysis outside RimWorld (with an LLM such as ChatGPT or any other tool) or directly inside the mod using Gemini (BYOK).
The extract includes all pawn (colonist) skills; health details; weapons; plus armor and clothing. Spare colony weapons, armor and clothing are also extracted.
